channel.title: Tekzilla (HD Quicktime)
channel.description: Embrace digital technology. Join the Tekzilla crew and make your tech work better for you. Or you can go live in the woods with an axe. Every Saturday, Patrick Norton and Veronica Belmont deliver product reviews, computer help, tech tips on everything from iPods to camcorders, HD to the Internet, plus do it yourself projects.
channel.itunes:summary: Embrace digital technology. Join the Tekzilla crew and make your tech work better for you. Or you can go live in the woods with an axe. Every Saturday, Patrick Norton and Veronica Belmont deliver product reviews, computer help, tech tips on everything from iPods to camcorders, HD to the Internet, plus do it yourself projects.

item.title: Tekzilla Daily Tip - Firefox: Why You Should Allow More Pop-ups
item.description: Pop-ups aren't all scams, stupid ads, or annoying. Many legitimate sites use them as well. But Firefox limits the number of sites that can allow pop-ups to 20. Find out how to increase that number with this simple hack.
item.content:encoded: Pop-ups aren't all scams, stupid ads, or annoying. Many legitimate sites use them as well. But Firefox limits the number of sites that can allow pop-ups to 20. Find out how to increase that number with this simple hack.

item.title: Tekzilla Daily Tip - Windows: Remove Personal Data From Public Files
item.description: You might not realize it, but many types of files store personal information in their meta-tags. Learn how a simple tool built into Vista can strip away that info before you upload your pics or documents to a public site.
